desc:
The Features Update is now available for EA SPORTS FC 25 and includes the changes below. We saw your positive reactions to the previous Gameplay Refresh Update and want to make sure we’re maintaining a consistent gameplay experience, so **we’re not making any changes to the balance of the game in this update**.

To learn more about this update and the features it will enable us to release in the near future, be sure to check out our [Pitch Notes](https://www.ea.com/en/games/ea-sports-fc/fc-25/news/fc-25-pitch-notes-features-update "‌").

### Ultimate Team

Made the following change:

- Added the ability to search by OVR ranges in Club, SBCs, Rush, and Evolutions.

### Gameplay

Made the following change:

- Updated Simulation mode slider presets to better pair them with tuning changes from the previous Title Update.

Addressed the following issue:

- Addressed instances of a stability issue that could have sometimes occurred during throw-ins.

### Clubs

Addressed the following issue:

- Some Rush rewards did not display correctly, this was a visual issue only.

### Career Mode

Made the following change:

- Added the ability to set Board Strictness in Live Starting Points.

‌

Addressed the following issue:

- Addressed a stability issue that could occur when simulating a match.

### General, Audio, and Visual

Addressed the following issues:

- Addressed instances of placeholder text and badge.

Want to provide us direct feedback about EA SPORTS FC 25? Visit [https://go.ea.com/fc25pf](https://go.ea.com/fc25pf "‌") and let us know what you think, it only takes a few minutes.

Thanks to those who’ve provided and continue to provide feedback. Throughout the course of the EA SPORTS FC 25 season, we'll provide you with more information and updates if and when they become available. Be sure to follow \@‌EASFCDIRECT on X and to check out the EA SPORTS FC Tracker for the latest news and updates.

- The EA SPORTS FC Team
name: [PC/PS4/PS5/XB1/XBSX|S/Switch] Features Update (Title Update #9)
